betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oDrop a haunted idol to summon Bane.

§fA voice resounding through the sheer cliffs of Greckon. A haunting chant.
Not the dragons in the outer skies of Terra, not the beasts of Lyndenwyrm. No, the true master of chaos and entropy, that is Bane.
Thanks to its powers, this creature can even alter the change of time in Greckon. 
This mastery over the power of entropy is what's behind the supercharging of the chickens now ravaging the land. 
Just to put things into perspective, the might of Lyndenwyrm alone was enough to move factions throughout the entire universe, and this creature alone can summon something that is as powerful and dangerous by itself? And do it multiple times?
